summary: Completed comprehensive testing of updated Pediatrics to Go application with all new features: Blood Gas Analysis, Electrolytes Calculator, and Jaundice Calculator. All functionality working correctly including landing page navigation, new dialogs, NICU calculator preservation, and backend API integration.
passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (/api/, /api/status, /api/blood-gas/analyze) - all working correctly
Blood gas analysis API correctly identifies metabolic acidosis and calculates Winter's formula
Landing page loads with 'Pediatrics to Go' title
NICU and Children cards displayed (Children properly disabled with 'Coming Soon' badge)
Bottom navigation bar with 5 icons: Blood Gas, Electrolytes, Coming(x2), Jaundice
Jaundice icon enabled with amber color
Blood Gas Dialog opens with AI Analysis and Manual Entry tabs
Manual Entry shows all 9 required fields (no albumin): pH, pCO2, pO2, HCO3, BE, Na, K, Cl, Lactate
Metabolic acidosis test case (pH=7.25, pCO2=30, HCO3=14, Na=140, Cl=110, lactate=4) works correctly
Results show Winter's formula: 'Expected pCO2: 29.0 ± 2 mmHg (Winter's formula: 1.5 × HCO3 + 8)'
Correctly identifies Metabolic Acidosis and Lactic Acidosis
Electrolytes Dialog opens with weight input only (no patient type selector)
All 6 tabs present: Calcium, Magnesium, Potassium, NaHCO3, Sodium, Phosphate (no Infusions tab)
Drug Infusions Reference card at bottom with 6 drug buttons
Calcium calculation (3.5kg) shows dose in mg AND ml: '350 mg (3.5 ml)'
Magnesium calculation shows NICU and General Ward doses in mg AND ml
Potassium calculation shows correct bolus text: '0.5-1 mEq/kg over 1-2 hours (preferably 2 hours)'
NaHCO3 tab shows 3 method options (HCO3, Base Excess, Both)
Jaundice Calculator opens with 'Neonatal Jaundice Calculator' title
All required inputs present: Weight, GA, Postnatal Age, Bilirubin with unit toggle (mg/dL ↔ µmol/L)
Risk factors dropdown functional
Test case (weight=2.5, GA=36, age=48hrs, bilirubin=15 mg/dL) shows correct results
PT and EX thresholds displayed with 'Phototherapy Required' recommendation
NICU Calculator functionality preserved and working correctly
Navigation between landing page and /nicu route works
Theme toggle works on all pages
All dialogs can be opened and closed properly

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All 4 API endpoints working correctly including blood gas analysis
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI components, new dialogs (Blood Gas, Electrolytes, Jaundice), navigation, calculations, and integrations working correctly
